item.title: Apache 2.4: IP Whitelisting
item.description: 1... 2... 3AuthType Basic 4AuthName "Development Area" 5AuthUserFile /var/www/sites/.htpasswd 6<RequireAny> 7Require ip 19.233.95.152 8Require ip 31.169.217.174 9Require ip 33.202.255.41 10Require ip 31.175.111.184 11Require ip 51.209.11.159 12Require ip 129.162.144.55 13Require valid-user 14</RequireAny> 15... 16... See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10419592/htaccess-htpasswd-bypass-if-at-a-certain-ip-address
